text: How do I get started with Gigy?
panelText: All you have to do is open an account, either as a hirer or a giga. All you need is your email, and your biodata and you’re set to find gigs in your area. All you have to do is open an account, either as a hirer or a giga. All you need is your email, and your biodata.
